title: Window Cleaning
description: Streak-free windows, interior and exterior, for brilliant clarity.
metaDescription: Professional window cleaning in Epsom & Surrey. Streak-free results using a water-fed pole system — no ladders, no chemicals. From £25. Fully insured.
longDescription: Our pure water-fed pole system reaches up to 60 feet, delivering streak-free results without ladders or chemicals. We clean both interior and exterior windows for homes and businesses across Epsom and Surrey.

faqs.question: Can you clean interior windows as well?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We offer both interior and exterior window cleaning. Our team uses lint-free cloths and eco-friendly solutions indoors to leave your windows sparkling without any residue.

faqs.question: How high can you reach?
faqs.answer: Our water-fed pole system reaches up to 60 feet (roughly four storeys). For anything higher, we carry out a site assessment first.

faqs.question: Will my floors get wet?
faqs.answer: We take great care to protect your floors and furnishings. Drop sheets are laid down when cleaning interior windows, so your carpets stay dry.

faqs.question: How often should I have my windows cleaned?
faqs.answer: We recommend every four to six weeks for residential properties and monthly for commercial premises to maintain a spotless appearance.

faqs.question: Do you remove paint spots or stickers?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can remove most adhesive residues, paint splashes and hard-water stains using specialist scraping tools and solutions.

title: Gutter Cleaning
description: Clear gutters for proper water flow and property protection.
metaDescription: Gutter cleaning in Epsom & Surrey using the SkyVac system. We clear blocked gutters safely from the ground — no ladders. From £45. Fully insured.
longDescription: Blocked gutters cause damp, mould and structural damage. Our SkyVac system clears debris safely from the ground, followed by a full inspection of joints and downpipes.

faqs.question: How do you clean gutters without ladders?
faqs.answer: We use the SkyVac system — a powerful vacuum with a long carbon-fibre pole and camera. It reaches up to four storeys and lets us clear debris safely from the ground.

faqs.question: How often should gutters be cleaned?
faqs.answer: We recommend at least once a year, ideally in late autumn after the leaves have fallen. Properties near trees may benefit from twice-yearly cleaning.

faqs.question: Do you inspect downpipes as well?
faqs.answer: Yes. Every gutter clean includes a full inspection of joints, brackets and downpipes. We flush them through to make sure water flows freely.

faqs.question: What happens if you find damage?
faqs.answer: We photograph any issues and provide a written report. We can carry out minor repairs on the spot or recommend a specialist if needed.

title: Domestic Cleaning
description: Comprehensive indoor cleaning for a spotless home.
metaDescription: Domestic cleaning services in Epsom & Surrey. Regular weekly cleans, one-off deep cleans and key holding. Fully insured, eco-friendly. From £20/hr.
longDescription: Tailored home cleaning plans for busy households. Whether you need a regular weekly visit or a thorough one-off deep clean, our trained team covers kitchens, bathrooms, bedrooms and living areas.

faqs.question: Can I book a regular weekly clean?
faqs.answer: Of course. We offer weekly, fortnightly and monthly packages to suit your schedule, all at competitive rates.

faqs.question: Do you bring your own products?
faqs.answer: Yes, we supply all eco-friendly cleaning products and equipment. If you prefer us to use specific products, just let us know.

faqs.question: Do you offer key holding?
faqs.answer: Yes. Many of our regular clients give us a spare key so we can clean while they are out. Keys are stored securely and insured.

faqs.question: What does a deep clean include?
faqs.answer: A deep clean covers everything from skirting boards and light switches to inside cupboards, appliances and behind furniture — every surface gets attention.

title: Carpet Cleaning
description: Deep cleaning to refresh and revitalise your carpets.
metaDescription: Professional carpet cleaning in Epsom & Surrey. Hot water extraction removes deep-set dirt, stains and allergens. Pet-friendly, child-safe. From £35.
longDescription: Our industrial hot-water extraction machines lift deep-set dirt, allergens and stains from carpets, rugs and upholstery. Safe for all fibre types and pet-friendly households.

faqs.question: Is carpet cleaning safe for pets?
faqs.answer: Yes. We use non-toxic, eco-friendly solutions that are safe for children and pets. Carpets are typically dry within two to four hours.

faqs.question: Can you remove stubborn stains?
faqs.answer: Most stains come out with our professional-grade equipment. We pre-treat tough marks like red wine, coffee and pet accidents before extraction.

faqs.question: Do you move furniture?
faqs.answer: We can move light furniture such as dining chairs and small tables. Larger items should be moved beforehand for the best results.

faqs.question: How long does carpet cleaning take?
faqs.answer: A typical three-bedroom house takes around two to three hours. We will give you an accurate estimate when you book.

title: Oven Cleaning
description: Thorough cleaning of ovens, hobs, and extractor fans.
metaDescription: Professional oven cleaning in Epsom & Surrey. Non-caustic, food-safe products for single, double, range and AGA ovens. Oven ready to use immediately. From £55.
longDescription: We deep-clean single, double, range and AGA ovens using non-caustic, eco-friendly products. Racks, trays, doors, seals and extractor fans are all included.

faqs.question: What types of oven do you clean?
faqs.answer: We clean all types — single, double, range cookers, AGAs and commercial ovens. Hobs, extractors and microwaves can be added as extras.

faqs.question: Are your products safe to use around food?
faqs.answer: Yes. We only use non-caustic, food-safe solutions. Your oven is ready to use as soon as we finish.

faqs.question: How long does an oven clean take?
faqs.answer: A single oven typically takes one to two hours. Double ovens and range cookers take a little longer.

faqs.question: Do you clean the extractor fan?
faqs.answer: Yes, extractor fan and filter cleaning is available as an add-on for a small extra charge.

title: Pressure & Soft Washing
description: Effective cleaning for driveways, patios, and exterior walls.
metaDescription: Pressure washing and soft washing in Epsom & Surrey. Driveways, patios, decking, render and cladding restored to pristine condition. From £80.
longDescription: We restore driveways, patios, decking and exterior walls to their original condition using commercial-grade pressure washers and gentle soft-wash techniques for delicate surfaces.

faqs.question: What is the difference between pressure washing and soft washing?
faqs.answer: Pressure washing uses high-pressure water for hard surfaces like concrete and block paving. Soft washing uses lower pressure with specialist solutions, ideal for render, cladding and painted surfaces.

faqs.question: Will pressure washing damage my paving?
faqs.answer: Not when done properly. We adjust the pressure and nozzle to suit the surface, and we always test a small area first.

faqs.question: Can you re-sand my block paving afterwards?
faqs.answer: Yes. We offer kiln-dried sand re-application after cleaning to stabilise the blocks and inhibit weed growth.

faqs.question: How long does a driveway take?
faqs.answer: A standard driveway takes around two to four hours depending on size and condition. We will give you a time estimate with your quote.

title: End of Tenancy Cleaning
description: Deep clean guaranteed to help secure your full deposit back.
metaDescription: End of tenancy cleaning in Epsom & Surrey. Full deep clean with satisfaction guarantee — helping tenants, landlords and letting agents pass inventory checks. From £120.
longDescription: Our end-of-tenancy clean covers every room from top to bottom — kitchen appliances, bathrooms, carpets, windows and all fixtures. Ideal for landlords, tenants and letting agents.

faqs.question: Is the clean guaranteed to pass an inventory check?
faqs.answer: Yes. We provide a satisfaction guarantee. If anything is flagged during the check-out inspection, we return to put it right at no extra cost.

faqs.question: Does it include carpet and oven cleaning?
faqs.answer: Our standard end-of-tenancy package includes oven and carpet cleaning. We can also add extras such as fridge, freezer and balcony cleaning.

faqs.question: How far in advance should I book?
faqs.answer: We recommend booking at least a week before your move-out date. Last-minute bookings are sometimes possible — call us to check availability.

faqs.question: Can you clean furnished properties?
faqs.answer: Yes, we clean both furnished and unfurnished properties. Furnished cleans take a little longer as we work around the furniture.

title: Commercial Cleaning
description: Reliable contract cleaning for offices, shops, and warehouses.
metaDescription: Commercial cleaning contracts in Epsom & Surrey. Offices, retail, warehouses and restaurants cleaned outside business hours. DBS checked staff. Custom quotes.
longDescription: Flexible cleaning contracts tailored to your business. We clean offices, retail units, warehouses, restaurants and communal areas outside normal working hours to minimise disruption.

faqs.question: Can you clean outside business hours?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Most of our commercial clients prefer early-morning or evening cleans. We work around your schedule.

faqs.question: Do you offer contract cleaning?
faqs.answer: Yes. We provide weekly, fortnightly and monthly contracts with fixed pricing. All contracts include a dedicated account manager.

faqs.question: Are your staff DBS checked?
faqs.answer: Yes. All our cleaners are fully vetted, DBS checked and trained to work in commercial environments.

faqs.question: What commercial premises do you cover?
faqs.answer: We clean offices, shops, restaurants, warehouses, schools, surgeries and communal areas in residential blocks.

title: Solar Panel Cleaning
description: Maximise efficiency with clean solar panels.
metaDescription: Solar panel cleaning in Epsom & Surrey using pure water — no chemicals, no scratching. Restore up to 25% lost energy output. From £40. Fully insured.
longDescription: Dirty solar panels lose up to 25% of their energy output. Our pure-water cleaning system safely removes bird droppings, algae and grime without scratching the glass.

faqs.question: How often should solar panels be cleaned?
faqs.answer: We recommend cleaning every six to twelve months. Panels near trees, roads or the coast may need more frequent attention.

faqs.question: Will cleaning really improve output?
faqs.answer: Yes. Studies show dirty panels can lose up to 25% efficiency. A professional clean restores maximum energy production.

faqs.question: Is it safe for the panels?
faqs.answer: Completely. We use de-ionised pure water and soft brushes — no chemicals or abrasive materials that could scratch or damage the coating.

faqs.question: Do you work on roof-mounted and ground-mounted panels?
faqs.answer: Yes. We clean both types using our water-fed pole system, which means no need to walk on your roof.

title: SkyVac Gutter Cleaning
description: Safe, high-reach gutter cleaning from the ground.
metaDescription: SkyVac gutter cleaning in Epsom & Surrey. Safe, no-ladder cleaning up to 12 metres with a built-in camera to show you the results. From £65. Fully insured.
longDescription: Our SkyVac industrial vacuum system clears gutters, fascias and soffits from ground level — no ladders, no scaffolding, no risk. A built-in camera lets us show you the results in real time.

faqs.question: What is SkyVac?
faqs.answer: SkyVac is an industrial gutter vacuum with lightweight carbon-fibre poles and an on-board camera. It clears debris from up to 12 metres without ladders.

faqs.question: Is SkyVac safe for my property?
faqs.answer: Yes. Because we work from the ground, there is no risk of ladder damage to walls, windowsills or flower beds.

faqs.question: Can I see the results?
faqs.answer: Yes. The built-in camera feeds a live image so you can see the before-and-after condition of your gutters on screen.

faqs.question: What areas do you cover with SkyVac?
faqs.answer: We cover Epsom, Ewell, Ashtead, Leatherhead, Banstead, Chessington and the wider Surrey area.

title: Conservatory Cleaning
description: Revive your conservatory with roof, frame, and window cleaning.
metaDescription: Conservatory cleaning in Epsom & Surrey. Roof, frames, windows and gutters cleaned with pure water — removing algae, moss and grime. From £95. Fully insured.
longDescription: We clean conservatory roofs, frames, windows and gutters using pure water and specialist tools. The result is a brighter, fresher conservatory free of algae, moss and grime.

faqs.question: Do you clean polycarbonate and glass roofs?
faqs.answer: Yes. We clean both polycarbonate and glass conservatory roofs using soft brushes and pure water to avoid scratching.

faqs.question: Will you clean the frames and seals?
faqs.answer: Yes. We clean all UPVC frames, seals and trims as part of the service. We can also treat algae-prone areas to slow regrowth.

faqs.question: How often should a conservatory be cleaned?
faqs.answer: We recommend every three to six months to keep algae and moss at bay, especially on north-facing roofs.

faqs.question: Do you clean the inside of the conservatory too?
faqs.answer: Yes. Interior glass and roof panels can be cleaned at the same time for a complete inside-and-out refresh.

title: Graffiti Removal
description: Fast, effective graffiti removal using safe methods.
metaDescription: Graffiti removal in Epsom & Surrey from brick, stone, metal and glass. Fast response within 24–48 hours using non-abrasive solutions. Anti-graffiti coatings available.
longDescription: We remove graffiti from brick, stone, metal, glass and painted surfaces using specialist non-abrasive solutions. Anti-graffiti coatings can be applied afterwards for long-term protection.

faqs.question: What surfaces can you treat?
faqs.answer: We remove graffiti from brick, stone, render, metal, glass, plastic and painted surfaces. Each material requires a different approach.

faqs.question: Will removal damage the surface underneath?
faqs.answer: No. We use non-abrasive, surface-appropriate solutions and test a small area first to ensure no damage.

faqs.question: Can you apply an anti-graffiti coating?
faqs.answer: Yes. We offer sacrificial and permanent anti-graffiti coatings that make future removal quick and easy.

faqs.question: How quickly can you respond?
faqs.answer: We aim to attend within 24 to 48 hours of your call. Fast removal reduces the chance of copycat vandalism.
